description: Fungal infection is a skin condition caused by fungi affecting moist areas.
Migraine is a neurological condition causing severe recurring headaches.
Diabetes is a chronic condition affecting blood sugar regulation.
Hypertension is high blood pressure that increases heart disease risk.
Gastritis is inflammation of the stomach lining.
Common cold is a viral infection of the nose and throat.
Pneumonia is an infection that inflames air sacs in the lungs.
Asthma is a condition where airways narrow causing breathing difficulty.
Heart attack occurs when blood flow to the heart is blocked.
Tuberculosis is a bacterial infection mainly affecting lungs.
